title: Glimpse of the Kingdom
snippet: A personal reflection on serving breakfast to homeless people with my children and the profound connections that emerged from stepping outside our comfort zone.

title: Peter Thiel: A Curated Collection of Resources
snippet: A comprehensive guide to Peter Thiel's talks, podcasts, writings, and ideas for anyone interested in learning more about one of Silicon Valley's most contrarian thinkers.

title: Questions to Ask a Landlord: Commercial Lease Negotiation Guide
snippet: A comprehensive list of questions to ask when negotiating a commercial lease, covering everything from basic terms to hidden costs and potential incentives.

title: Informational Interviews: What to Do When They Don't Want to Meet
snippet: Strategies for networking and conducting informational interviews when people prefer email over in-person meetings, and how to make the most of remote networking opportunities.
